name: apacfinstab
title: APAC FINSTAB - Crypto Regulatory Intelligence
description: Real-time regulatory intelligence for crypto businesses in Asia-Pacific. Track policy changes, compliance requirements, and licensing rules across 13 APAC jurisdictions.

tools.name: getLatestPolicies
tools.description: Get latest crypto policy events from APAC regions. Filter by region, topic, and time range.

tools.name: getRegionOverview
tools.description: Get comprehensive regulatory overview for a specific APAC region including licensing, stablecoin rules, and compliance framework.

tools.name: comparePolicies
tools.description: Compare crypto policies across multiple APAC regions by topic.

tools.name: checkCompliance
tools.description: Check compliance requirements for a business model in specific regions.
